actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to reduce by 20 percent the number of aliens who may lawfully enter the United States for permanent residence under the provisions of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

summary.text: Revises the Immigration and Nationality Act to reduce by 20 percent the number of aliens who may lawfully enter the United States for permanent residence.

titles.title: A bill to reduce by 20 percent the number of aliens who may lawfully enter the United States for permanent residence under the provisions of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
